data.text: @benigncerulean @queenchristina_ Hope you feel better very soon!
@benigncerulean Oh you poor, poor thing. I really hope you feel better soon, and that the book offers some kind of distraction, even if not much cheer. 🤞💐
@benigncerulean @queenchristina_ Yes! Looking forward to reading it very much!
@lauravarnam @queenchristina_ Thank you! Doing my best 🤞 This is next on the TBR pile - might be up your street too! https://t.co/h2Hli6neFy
@benigncerulean @queenchristina_ So sorry to hear this, Claire! Get well soon! 🙏🏻💗
@slbsamantha @queenchristina_ Not much fun at all 🤒 but a restorative book goes a long way!
@benigncerulean @queenchristina_ Oh no. It got you?  Yuk.
